alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 3:20PM AKST until December 12 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Baranof Island and Northern Prince of Wales Island including Port Alexander, Coffman Cove, and Point Baker. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy, wet snow may be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow is expected to increase in coverage and intensity this evening with the heaviest snowfall expected overnight. Snowfall rates of up to 1 to 2 inches per hour will be possible at times. Snow amounts may widely vary over short distances.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island
